title: An Import Map
description:
An import map which is used to remap imports when modules are loaded.

See https://deno.land/manual@v1.6.0/linking_to_external_code/import_maps in the Deno documentation for more information.

imports.description: A map of specifiers to their remapped specifiers.

additionalProperties.description: The key is the specifier or partial specifier to match, with a value that represents the target specifier.

scopes.description: Define a scope which remaps a specifier in only a specified scope

additionalProperties.description: A definition of a scoped remapping.
The key is the specifier or partial specifier to match within the referring scope, with a value that represents the target specifier.
